text: Martinius is a genus of minute marsh-loving beetles in the family Limnichidae. There are at least three described species in Martinius. ==Species== * Martinius ripisaltator Spilman, 1966 * Martinius tellepontis Spilman, 1959 * Martinius temporalis Wooldridge, 1988 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * Category:Byrrhoidea genera
title: Martinius (beetle)
